movies.title: A Fugitive from the Past
movies.plot: Three thieves escape from a heist, one of them killing the other two. He is sheltered by a prostitute and sought after by the police, but only after ten years his true motivation unravels.
movies.simplePlot: Three thieves escape from a heist, one of them killing the other two. He is sheltered by a prostitute and sought after by the police, but only after ten years his true motivation unravels.

biography.bio: Rentarô Mikuni was born on January 20, 1923 in Gunma, Japan as Masao Sato. He was an actor and director, known for Vengeance Is Mine (1979), The Burmese Harp (1956) and Kwaidan (1964). He died on April 14, 2013 in Inagi, Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Rentarô Mikuni

biography.bio: Sachiko Hidari was born on June 29, 1930 in Toyama, Japan as Sachiko Nukamura. She was an actress and director, known for A Fugitive from the Past (1965), She and He (1963) and Darkness at Noon (1956). She was married to Susumu Hani. She died on November 7, 2001 in National Cancer Center, Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Sachiko Hidari

biography.bio: Kôji Mitsui was born on March 6, 1910 in Yokohama, Japan. He was an actor, known for Woman in the Dunes (1964), The Hidden Fortress (1958) and High and Low (1963). He died on July 20, 1979 in Kamakura, Kanagawa, Japan.
biography.name: Kôji Mitsui

biography.bio: Yoshi Katô was born on January 12, 1913 in Tokyo, Japan. He was an actor, known for Tampopo (1985), Hometown (1983) and Lone Wolf and Cub: Sword of Vengeance (1972). He was married to Isuzu Yamada. He died on March 1, 1988.
biography.name: Yoshi Katô

biography.bio: Sadako Sawamura was born on November 11, 1908 in Asakusa, Tokyo, Japan. She was an actress, known for Chrysanthèmes tardifs (1954), A Fugitive from the Past (1965) and Fin d'automne (1960). She was married to Kamatari Fujiwara and Yasuhiko Ôhashi. She died on August 16, 1996.
biography.name: Sadako Sawamura

biography.bio: Susumu Fujita was born on January 8, 1912 in Fukuoka, Japan. He was an actor, known for The Hidden Fortress (1958), Yojimbo (1961) and Sanshiro Sugata (1943). He died on March 23, 1991 in Shibuya, Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Susumu Fujita

biography.bio: Akiko Kazami was born on July 23, 1921 in Tomioka, Gunma, Japan as Fusa Nakamura. She was an actress, known for Repast (1951), Tsuchi (1939) and Red Beard (1965). She died on September 28, 2016 in Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Akiko Kazami

biography.bio: Seiichirô Kameishi is an actor, known for Invasion of the Neptune Men (1961), A Fugitive from the Past (1965) and Champion Joe (1980).
biography.name: Seiichirô Kameishi

biography.bio: Shûsuke Sone is an actor, known for A Fugitive from the Past (1965), Jun'ai monogatari (1957) and Prince of Space (1959).
biography.name: Shûsuke Sone

biography.bio: Mitsuo Andô was born on August 26, 1928 in Tokyo, Japan. He was an actor, known for Spider Man (1978), Himitsu Sentai Gorenger (1975) and A Fugitive from the Past (1965). He died in 1997.
biography.name: Mitsuo Andô

biography.bio: Rin'ichi Yamamoto was born in 1927. He was an actor, known for Invasion of the Neptune Men (1961), Shogun (1980) and Lady Snowblood 2: Love Song of Vengeance (1974). He died in 1980.
biography.name: Rin'ichi Yamamoto

biography.bio: Shôken Sawa is an actor, known for A Fugitive from the Past (1965), Gamblers in Okinawa (1971) and Invasion of the Neptune Men (1961).
biography.name: Shôken Sawa

biography.bio: Tadashi Suganuma is an actor, known for Ana-ta-han (1953), A Fugitive from the Past (1965) and Abashiri Bangaichi (1965).
biography.name: Tadashi Suganuma

biography.bio: Sachi Shindô is an actress, known for A Fugitive from the Past (1965), The Kôsuke Kindaichi Series 7: The Phoenix (1988) and Ring: The Final Chapter (1999).
biography.name: Sachi Shindô

biography.bio: Yuriko Anjô is an actress, known for A Fugitive from the Past (1965), Hommes, porcs et loups (1964) and Zoku zûzûshii yatsu (1964).
biography.name: Yuriko Anjô
